definition: apex/crown of the head/top/roof/most/to carry on the head/to push to the top/to go against/to replace/to substitute/to be subjected to (an aerial bombing, hailstorm etc)/(slang) to "bump" a forum thread to raise its profile/classifier for headwear, hats, veils etc

sentences.english: The developer claims that this game has been a top-seller on wireless and on retail platforms.
sentences.chinese: 开发商声称，这场比赛已顶级无线和卖方的零售平台。

sentences.english: Second-level domain names may be applied for directly under the top-level domain names.
sentences.chinese: 在顶级域名下可以直接申请注册二级域名。

sentences.english: I do not deny that your No. 33 bleached cotton is top quality.
sentences.chinese: 意思为我不否认你的33号漂白棉花质量是顶级的。

sentences.english: First-class teachers have a good sense of humor.

sentences.chinese: 这是一个顶级的在线摄像头。

sentences.english: Manchester United have won the top division title in England no less than 19 times.
sentences.chinese: 曼联在以往的英格兰顶级联赛中至少成功夺魁19次。

sentences.english: No wonder the banana is the number one fruit with the world\\\'s leading athletes.
sentences.chinese: 怪不得香蕉能够成为世界顶级运动员的首选水果。

sentences.english: The sartorial shift has translated into sales gains for top brands.
sentences.chinese: 这一趋势的转变已转化为顶级品牌的销售收益。

sentences.english: All parts are machined from top grade, high tensile aluminium.
sentences.chinese: 所有零件都是用顶级高强度铝加工而成。

sentences.english: Eric Warner (Michael Ealy) is the top figure in the financial sector, the future of limitless.
sentences.chinese: 是金融界的顶级人物，前途不可限量。

sentences.english: He reigns as the top Hallyu Star and often is described with numbers.
sentences.chinese: 他是顶级韩流明星，并且经常被人与数位连在一起。

sentences.english: IDEAL supplies zippers to the leading apparel brands and retailers in the USA and Europe.
sentences.chinese: 理想拉链集团是众多欧美顶级衣履品牌之拉链供货商。

sentences.english: But it's not going to be the over- the - top circus you saw in 2006.
sentences.chinese: 但它不会是超顶级的马戏你看到在2006年。

sentences.english: Now, on some systems, that means that you get the top-level one.
sentences.chinese: 现在，在一些系统上这意味着获得了顶级的符号。

sentences.english: We're a Top, award-winning video production agency combining strong creative, strategy and quality content.
sentences.chinese: 我们是一个顶级的视频制作机构。

sentences.english: Nine World Top-Level Chocolate, Have You Tasted All?
sentences.chinese: 世界九大顶级巧克力，你都尝过吗？

definition: peak/apex/world best/number one/finest (competitors)/top (figures in a certain field)
to count as number one (idiom); second to none/outstanding
old, well-known brand/old style/old school/an old hand/experienced veteran
